title: Who to contact at Riot Games Oceania for investment opportunities in OCS and OPL?
body:
Hi all,

I'm looking to talk with someone at Riot Games Oceania about investment opportunities in the OCS and OPL. Is there a specific lead or department head I can reach? Looking for a response from Riot team. 

Thanks for your help!

replies.body: Maybe this post would be helpful - http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/exile5-tenders-now-open-75339

@ihatebrick

Yep, start by reading this article and emailing through to the address in here and you will get ahold of someone who will have a further discussion ;)
Thanks guys. @Belquin - I also reached out to you on twitter. Would like to follow-up with you there as well. Thanks again for the quick responses guys. Cheers.
Ahh ok! I'm putting the pieces together now :) feel free to DM me, but that email in the article is the best starting point {{summoner:14}}

I know that [Maraudaur](https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/) is very responsive on facebook, and even though it's not his department, he might be able to provide a direct email ( I'm not sure if they are public, so can't do it myself, sorry )

You'll likely get onto either Daniel Ringland ( Esports OCE lead ) or Master Mirkinen ( Head of Riot OCE )
Thanks Jason - I'll do this as well. Appreciate your help. Cheers.
